Posts.Content: Jan 30, 2008 12:17PM ginny13 wrote: I just want to make a comment about starting chemo.  I was diagnosed in aug 23, 2007.  I had my surgery on 10/15/07 with reconstruction.  my first treatment was 11.30/07.  I was really luckly i only needed 4 treatments of taxotere and cytoxal.  my last treatment is this friday 2/1/08.  i will need 25 radiations treatments.  I felt the same way how am i going to get through this.  I was scared and yes change is hard.  take each treatment 1 at a time.  The day of your treatment eat a good breafast.  Then the next few days eat more frequent but light meals.  Your are going to get through this you are a survivor,  Your friends and family are your support group and that is what is going to get you through this.  You are a strong person!!!!!! Believe it or not my good friend has a condo in Daytona Beach Florida
Posts.Title: Scared!!!! how do I prepare for chemo thedudess buckie
